details.title: Percolation Initial State EDGE Config 4
details.author: Eric Xie
details.description: This is the fourth of five XML files for the percolation simulation, but with a source water cell on the edge. This simulation has a source water cell on both the top left and bottom right corner, which should spread out evenly toward each other and fill the entire grid up. The "last" step of the function covers the middle diagonal.
